settings.custom_html:
<style>
/* left education bar styles*/
.container {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.left-column {
  flex: 0 0 25%;
  order: 1;
  padding: 15px;
}

.right-column {
  flex: 1;
  order: 2; 
  Padding: 15px;
}

.left-sub-nav ul{
	padding-left:15px;
}

.left-sub-nav ul li{
	padding:4px 5px 4px 0;
	list-style:none;
	font-size: 13px;
}

.left-sub-nav .nav-group{
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
	margin-bottom:10px;
}

.left-sub-nav .main-nav-cat{
	background-color:#303e49;
	padding:10px 10px;
	color:#fff;
}


/* Add media query to change the layout on smaller screens */

@media (max-width: 1000px) {
  .left-column {
	flex: 0 0 35%;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 767px) {
  .left-column {
	flex: 0 0 100%;
    order: 2; /* move the left column back to the first position */
  }
  .right-column {
	flex: 0 0 100%;
    order: 1; /* move the right column back to the second position */
  }
}





</style>

<style>
/* Calculators */


.calcBlock .calc-heading{font-size:20px; padding-bottom:10px; font-weight:bold;}
.calcBlock .calc-row{width:100%;}
.calcBlock .calc-row div{text-align:center; display:inline-block;}
.calcBlock .calc-block{background-color:#d9ecf1; border:1px solid #9fceda; padding:15px 25px 15px 25px;}
.calcBlock input {background-color: #fff; border: 1px solid #898989; height: 65px; width: 100%; color: #777777;
    -webkit-border-radius: 10px; border-radius: 10px; text-align:center; font-size:22px; font-weight:bold;}
.calcBlock .asterisk-notes{font-size:10px; padding-top:5px;}

.vac-used-calc .labels{font-size:12px; font-weight:bold; padding:10px 5px 4px 5px;}
.vac-used-calc .calc-row-2{width:100%; margin:auto;}
.vac-used-calc .calc-row-2 div{text-align:center; display:inline-block;}
.vac-used-calc .calc-row-2 .field{width:28%; margin:0 2%;}
.vac-used-calc .calc-row-2 .colTitle{font-weight:bold; font-size:16px; width:100%; margin-bottom:5px;}
.vac-used-calc .calc-row-2 .colTitle a{color:#777777;}
.vac-used-calc .calc-row-2 .colProdPrice{color:#E64D25;}
.calc-block.vac-used-calc input.small{height:38px;}
.calc-block.vac-used-calc input.small:hover{background-color:#E64D25; color:#fff;}
.calc-block.vac-used-calc input.small.hoverstate{background-color:#E64D25; color:#fff;}
.calc-block.vac-used-calc .result-col input{background:none !important; border:none; height:33px}
.vac-used-calc .calc-row-2 .result-header{font-size:14px; text-decoration:underline; margin-bottom:3px;}
.vac-used-calc .calc-row-2 .result{font-size:12px; font-weight:bold; display:block;}
.vac-used-calc .calc-row-2 .result-col{padding: 10px; background-color: #fff; border: 1px solid #898989; width: 100%; -webkit-border-radius: 10px; border-radius: 10px;}
.vac-used-calc .calc-row-2 .result-val{color:#026994;}
.vac-used-calc .calc-row-2 .payoff{font-size:20px; color:#E64D25; font-weight:bold;}
.vac-used-calc sup{font-size:8px; top:-8px;}
.vac-used-calc .calc-row-2 .divide-line{width:100%; background-color:#ccc; height:1px; margin-bottom:5px}

@media only screen and (max-width:1199px){
    #vac_use_form{overflow:scroll; display:block;}
    .vac-used-calc{min-width:520px}
    .vac-used-calc .calc-row-2 .result,
    .vac-used-calc .calc-row-2{font-size:12px;}
}


</style>

Vacuum Efficiency Calculator

In recent years, backpack vacuums have been becoming increasingly popular in commercial settings. Backpack vacuums offer a range of benefits that has helped become so popular as outlined in our comparison video. First of all, backpack vacuums are lightweight and versatile. When worn properly, the effect of the backpack on your body and posture is small and similar to walking. Backpack vacuums truly shine when the cleaning environment has many obstacles like desks, stairs, and chairs. In these environments, a backpack vacuum improves your cleaning rate thanks to being able to maneuver the lightweight wand in more places than a upright can go.

The wand also makes it also easier to swap out tools on the fly for different surfaces and can reach higher surfaces than an upright. On stairs, backpack vacuums are safer and reduce the risk of falling. Lastly, traditional backpack vacuums have less moving parts than uprights, which means less maintenance and better dependability on your vacuums. Backpack vacuums have a higher cleaning rate thanks to many of these reasons. Check out our calculator below to see how much you can save in labor costs when you switch to a backpack vacuum.
